tool_description: 指定した地点から指定した時間で到着できる地点や駅を検索できます。　Search points and stations that can be reached from the specific points in a specific time.
name: NAVITIME Reachable
title: NAVITIME Reachable

api_list.name: reachable_motorcycle
api_list.description: バイクを移動手段として、指定した地点から指定した時間または距離で到達可能な地点を探索します。

optional_parameters.name: motorcycle_fare
optional_parameters.description:
Toll road use flag.
(free: no toll road use, 
toll: use toll roads (default))

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: partition_count
optional_parameters.description:
Number of divisions of the reach search.
(either 3,4,6,9,12,18,36,40,45,60,72 or 90)
Specifies the number of divisions of the 360-degree search area.

If you specify 36, the direction of travel is divided by 10 degrees, and a total of 36 points will be calculated.

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description:
Departure time.
(ex: 2022-01-26T08:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description:
Range of search distances.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 300,000)
The unit is \"meters\".

Specify either the term or the range.

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description:
Range of search time.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 180)
The unit is \"minutes\".

Specify either the term or the range.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: displacement
optional_parameters.description:
Displacement of the motorcycle.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 3000)

api_list.name: reachable_transit
api_list.description:
Search reachable stations from the specified latitude and longitude by train and on foot, including airplane.
Reachable range within the specified time or number of transfer is retrieved.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: Range of search time. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 180) The unit is "minutes".

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Skips a given number of first data. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (node_detail: detailed information about the node)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: unuse
optional_parameters.description: Public transportation that does not use. Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: term_from
optional_parameters.description: Lower limit of the search range. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value : value of the term, Default value: 0) The unit is "minutes".

optional_parameters.name: transit_limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of transfers. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 30)

optional_parameters.name: node_type
optional_parameters.description: Output node type. Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: walk_speed
optional_parameters.description: Walking speed. (Minimum value: 3.0, Maximum value: 8.0, Default value: 5) The Unit is "km/h".  Small numbers are valid up to the first place.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 2000, Default value: 10)

api_list.name: reachable_car
api_list.description:
Search reachable points from the specified latitude and longitude by automobile.
Reachable range within the specified time or distance is retrieved.

optional_parameters.name: partition_count
optional_parameters.description: Number of divisions of the reach search. (either 3, 4, 6, 9, 12, 18, or 36)  Specifies the number of divisions of the 360-degree search area.  If you specify 36, the direction of travel is divided by 10 degrees, and a total of 36 points will be calculated.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: car_fare
optional_parameters.description: Toll road use flag. (free: no toll road use,  toll: use toll roads (default))

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description: Range of search time. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 180) The unit is "minutes".  Specify either the term or the range.

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: Departure time. (ex: 2019-09-26T08:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description: Range of search distances. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 300,000) The unit is "meters".  Specify either the term or the range.

api_list.name: reachable_walk
api_list.description:
Search reachable points from the specified latitude and longitude by walk.
Reachable range within the specified time or distance is retrieved.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description: Range of search distances. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 300,000) The unit is "meters".  Specify either the term or the range.

optional_parameters.name: partition_count
optional_parameters.description: Number of divisions of the reach search. (either 3, 4, 6, 9, 12, 18, or 36)  Specifies the number of divisions of the 360-degree search area.  If you specify 36, the direction of travel is divided by 10 degrees, and a total of 36 points will be calculated.

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description: Range of search time. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 180) The unit is "minutes".  Specify either the term or the range.

optional_parameters.name: walk_speed
optional_parameters.description: Walking speed. (Minimum value: 3.0, Maximum value: 8.0, Default value: 5) Unit is "km/h".  Small numbers are valid up to the first place.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

api_list.name: reachable_bicycle
api_list.description:
Search reachable points from the specified latitude and longitude by bicycle.
Reachable range within the specified time or distance is retrieved.

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description: Range of search distances. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 300,000) The unit is "meters".  Specify either the term or the range.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: bicycle_speed
optional_parameters.description: Bicycle speed. (Minimum value: 5, Maximum value: 132, Default value: 15) Unit is "km/h".  Small numbers are valid up to the first place.

optional_parameters.name: partition_count
optional_parameters.description: Number of divisions of the reach search. (either 3, 4, 6, 9, 12, 18, or 36)  Specifies the number of divisions of the 360-degree search area.  If you specify 36, the direction of travel is divided by 10 degrees, and a total of 36 points will be calculated.

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description: Range of search time. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 180) The unit is "minutes".  Specify either the term or the range.
